title: Ticket #6077: condor_starter -classad now need to run as root
description:
condor_starter -classad is frequently used for debugging, and used to run without privilege. It now errors out with: 

$ condor_starter -classad
01/05/17 10:34:05 (pid:1745739) (D_ALWAYS) Can't open "/ssd/condor/StarterLog"
ERROR "Cannot open log file '/ssd/condor/StarterLog'" at line 208 in file /slots/02/dir_1435936/userdir/.tmpo4sb3v/BUILD/condor-8.5.8/src/condor_utils/dprintf_setup.cpp
creator: gthain
